title: BitcoinMoses
author: BitcoinMoses
content: Every thing are Controlled by Time, Even the Bitcoin Price . The Bitcoin Time Machine will determine the price of Bitcoin in the future.  Currently few Bitcoin whales are controlling and manipulating Bitcoin price.  I think, all the Bitcoin exchange should be regulated to only make the sale for other Bitcoin owner without them to transfer Bitcoin in the exchange.  P2P transaction is the best way to buy or sale Bitcoin without going through a third party like those Bitcoin exchange.  Every individual must be able to buy and sale bitcoin from the person and to the person. What do you think ?

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Actually this is the post... and it is a particular appreciation, where fortunately some people love to make philosophical "tangles," then, they forget the basic and simple coherence that is to known Bitcoin.Its title is redundant, you say; "Everything is controlled by time", that phrase refers to the existential set of the system of which you are a part, it is redundant to say, even bitcoin.Then in an extended version of a repetitive context, the "whales" control, manipulate or add the institutional ones, etc. to reach the bipolar "yes and no", which is generated in the discussion, always.Then you add that P2P is the best way to buy and sell, oh, yes! you discovered warm water.(sarcasm)OP, the "possibility" that bitcoin may have purchase options is governed mainly by the same community, centralized exchanges are successful because they fill up with users, so the question is, what can be done to try to teach one of the main premises of bitcoin, nothing, the answer is there in the very idea genesis of bitcoin, decentralization.So, I don't know what the hell you're trying to say with time and bitcoin, it's the way of thinking of users that although they read and understand what is decentralization means, they ignore it, others of course have no wtf idea what decentralization means, there is people who shout, if bitcoin is the change for traditional banking but they are not able to "move" in the basic premises of bitcoin, the most neglected is decentralization.

comments.author: Hypnosis00
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on January 31, 2023, 07:48:53 PMEvery thing are Controlled by Time, Even the Bitcoin Price . What do you think ? What I think is that whales are not controlling Bitcoin, they can't change the nature of the project and it will remain decentralized no matter what. Whales are here to enjoy the market, that is true but being the owner of the entire crypto market. I admit that manipulations occur in the market but if we talk about the control of Bitcoin price, I certainly doubted it. We have to be aware of the market volatility and the price of Bitcoin will pump or dump normally, not because it was being planned to what will happen next otherwise, Mr. Satoshi had failed.

comments.body: btc is controlled by the amount of people who are interested and how many coins are in circulation. It has nothing to do with time. The halvings are created to create deflation over time and not all at once to stop btc falling flat and people losing interest. Btc is the only deflationary asset you can invest in today. comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Yes, "time" are very important.... in Bitcoin....Example - "10 minute block time" - every 10 minutes a new block of transactions is added to the blockchain and transactions within the block are considered to be 'processed'.Also take the Bitcoin "Halving" that takes place every 4 years. The Bitcoin halving is when the reward for Bitcoin mining is cut in half. These are some of the most important things where time has an influence on the Bitcoin price.... not the time that you have to wait for the price to recover for you to make a profit.
